New Records: Zach Edey set career-high 25 points and 12 rebounds, breaking rookie records with a 20/10 game and shooting 90% from the floor
Key Match Events: Zach Edey led 30-23 in the first quarter, but the Grizzlies ultimately lost to the Nets in a close match
Dennis Schroder played a key role for the Nets with 20 points and six assists
Post-Match Reflections: Zach Edey's performance provided confidence for the Grizzlies despite the loss
The Nets' clutch play and Schroder's effectiveness were highlighted as factors in their victory
Miscellaneous Highlights: Zach Edey's stats included 25 points, 12 rebounds, seven assists, and four blocks
The absence of Desmond Bane impacted the Grizzlies' 3-point shooting
